amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.para: Before any sale of abandoned real estate is made the council or board of trustees shall by ordinance set forth the date of the purchase, gift or condemnation, a description of the property, the purpose for which the same was acquired, the abandonment of the same, and that a sale is deemed expedient; and shall fix the time, place, terms, and manner of sale and shall reserve the right to reject any and all bids.
